item.title: Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer for Motorcycle, Power Sport, Marine, and Automotive Batteries

item.content:encoded:

Best Sellers Rank #825 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)

Date First Available February 6, 2018

Warranty & Support

For warranty information about this product, please Click here [PDF ]

Price: $86.99 - $40.87
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:55 UTC – Details)


DIY and professional mechanics trust Schumacher Electric’s extensive line of battery chargers and maintainers to keep their automotive, power sports, motorcycle, and marine batteries in top condition. The Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer is specifically designed to keep your 6V and 12V batteries fully charged and in optimum health. With a 15A rapid charge and a 3A charge/maintain mode, the SC1280 charges batteries quickly and then maintains a full charge while connected. Choose the 15A rate for charging automotive, marine, and light truck batteries. For smaller batteries, such as those used in garden tractors, snowmobiles, and motorcycles, select the 3A rate. Microprocessor controlled, the Schumacher SC1280 automatically adjusts the amperage rate during charging and maintaining as necessary. The unit also features auto voltage detection, float mode monitoring to maintain optimal battery charge, and multi-stage charging. Additional features include reverse hook-up protection, bad battery detection, a digital display, LED indicators, push-button controls, and color-coded clamps.
FULLY AUTOMATIC: The Schumacher SC1280 automatically detects 6V and 12V batteries. When the battery is fully charged, the unit automatically stops charging and shifts to maintain mode.
MICROPROCESSOR CONTROLLED: After gathering information from the connected battery, the microprocessor adjusts voltage and charge, allowing fast charging without negatively impacting battery capacity and longevity.
BOOST BATTERY HEALTH: The unit features multi-stage charging and float-mode monitoring for optimum battery health and extended battery life.
COMPATIBLE BATTERIES: The Schumacher SC1280 will charge 6V and 12V standard, AGM, gel, and deep-cycle batteries.
REVERSE HOOK-UP PROTECTION: With advanced reverse hook-up protection, the charger protects against damage if the clamps are not properly connected.

Essential Charging and Maintaining

Keep Batteries in Top Condition

Keep 12V batteries in optimum condition with the Schumacher SC1280 15A 6V/12V Fully Automatic Battery Charger and Maintainer. The SC1280 features auto voltage detection, multi-stage charging, float mode monitoring, bad battery detection, and reverse hook-up protection.

Advanced Battery Charging Technology

FLOAT MODE MONITORING

While in float mode, a battery maintainer delivers a small current when necessary to keep the unit fully charged.

MULTI-STAGE CHARGING

Keep your batteries in top condition with Schumacher’s advanced charging algorithm for optimum battery health.

BUILT-IN SAFETY

The SC1280 prevents battery damage with reverse hook-up protection, which stops the charger from operating if the clamps are reversed.

MULTI-FUNCTION DISPLAY

Use the display to check battery voltage, charging status, and percent of charge. The LEDs denote charging and maintain status and clamps reversed.

YOU CAN RELY ON SCHUMACHER

KEEP IT ROLLING WITH SCHUMACHER’S LINE OF BATTERY CHARGERS/MAINTAINERS

Professional mechanics and automotive enthusiasts trust Schumacher Electric to provide high-quality and innovative automotive products. Since 1947, Schumacher has been designing and producing industry-leading power conversion technology. Schumacher’s current range of products includes EV chargers, traditional battery chargers, maintainers, jump starters, portable power stations, diagnostic tools, battery accessories, LED work lights, lithium-powered products, and more.


Previous page

  1. HOME GARAGE

    Every home garage should have a quality Schumacher battery charger/maintainer.

  2. POWER SPORT RIDERS

    The SC1280 ensures that your motorcycle, ATV, and other power sports batteries are ready to play.

  3. CAR RESTORERS

    The unit’s maintain mode can keep your battery in top condition during restoration.

  4. BOATERS

    The unit can be used to maintain marine batteries, although they should be maintained on shore.

Next page

1 HOME GARAGE 2 POWER SPORT RIDERS 3 CAR RESTORERS 4 BOATERS

return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;

return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}

Price: $54.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:47 UTC – Details)

Product Description

A product is only as good as the materials it’s made from.The haisstronica heat shrink connector copper wire is made of red copper.
Tin plating effectively prevents corrosion and up to 99.9% copper is more conductive than ordinary connectors.

3:1 Heat Shrink Tubing
Unlike cheap,low-quality connectors.These high-quality,thick heat shrink tubing won’t puncture when crimping,and won’t break easily.
After heating,the end penetrates enough hot melt adhesive to form a firm seal.Unyielding protection at all times!

The brazing seam with exquisite craftsmanship ensures that the wire is not easy to fall off after crimping,forming a neat and firm crimp.No worries in wire connection!

Haisstronica’s heat shrink wire connectors are marked with wire gauges for easy identification.
Just measure the wiring,and by checking the wire gauge markings on the polyolefin tubing,you can quickly select the appropriate connector.

A MUST FOR ANY MARINE WIRING PROJECTS:The package includes 280PCS heat shrink connectors,A crimping tool for heat shrink wire connectors(HS-8327),Wire stripper.Great value for wiring lovers.
CRIMPER TOOL:The professional jaw can quickly and easily crimping various types of heat shrink connectors. The indentation will not damage the shell during the crimp. It firmly grasps the wires. Each crimper tool is marked with red/blue/yellow for easy identification.
PRECISE RATCHET STRUCTURE:According to the pressure needed to crimp products of different sizes,built-in thickened ratchet automatically adjusts to the appropriate position to ensure the safe completion of crimping with easy release of the handle. Adjustable crimp height of star wheel,to ensure the right amount of crimping force.
EXTREMELY RELIABLE CRIMPING:The 3:1 heat shrink connector with adhesive lined will exude hot melt adhesive after being evenly heate,quickly shrink and adhesion to the insulation of the wire.Waterproof,Wear-resistant.Create a complete environmental seal.
PERFECT COMBINATION:Using haisstronica crimper tools with wire connectors to meet the different needs of your work.








  • A product is only as good as the materials it’s made from.The haisstronica heat shrink connector copper wire is made of red copper.
  • Tin plating effectively prevents corrosion and up to 99.9% copper is more conductive than ordinary connectors.

  • 3:1 Heat Shrink Tubing
  • Unlike cheap,low-quality connectors.These high-quality,thick heat shrink tubing won’t puncture when crimping,and won’t break easily.
  • After heating,the end penetrates enough hot melt adhesive to form a firm seal.Unyielding protection at all times!

  • The brazing seam with exquisite craftsmanship ensures that the wire is not easy to fall off after crimping,forming a neat and firm crimp.No worries in wire connection!

  • Haisstronica’s heat shrink wire connectors are marked with wire gauges for easy identification.
  • Just measure the wiring,and by checking the wire gauge markings on the polyolefin tubing,you can quickly select the appropriate connector.

Read more

4.5
Price: $54.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:47 UTC – Details)

item.title: New Transit Platinum Series 32″ 12-Volt DC Powered Smart TV by Free Signal TV for RVs, Campers, Marine and Off-Grid Applications. Includes Built in WiFi, DVD Player, Bluetooth, Apps, HDMI/USB inputs
item.dc:creator: admin

Date First Available October 18, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $499.00
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:34:41 UTC – Details)


Our Customers asked and Free Signal TV has delivered! The next generation of mobile 12V DC powered high-definition televisions have arrived, featuring built-in Smart TV features that campers, boaters and tailgaters have been asking for! The Transit Platinum 12 Volt TV line offers 22”, 28”, 32” and 40” high-definition 1080p LED screen sizes with built in Wifi/Internet connectivity and other cutting-edge features like ultra-low power draw, integrated SD-DVD player, easy Bluetooth connectivity, popular apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube and many more. Engineered for long lasting mobile use with vibration resistant chassis and durable 1080p high resolution LED screen. Standard home use televisions don’t last in a mobile environment – and the Transit Platinum models feature unique “Flex-Environment” engineering which allows reliable operation across a wide range of temperatures and humidities for reliable use in demanding environments. Manufactured to Free Signal TV’s rigid quality control standards and backed by a one-year free replacement warranty – an industry first that debuted with the original Transit 12 DC powered TV line. Easy set up and operation, includes 110V optional powerbrick, 12V car charger outlet cord, multi-function “one-key command” remote, and detailed user manual. Supported by Free Signal TV’s top-rated domestic-based Customer Care and Tech Support Teams for assistance with questions and customized set-up applications. Experience the enjoyment, performance and peace of mind that only Free Signal TV’s unique Advanced Entertainment Solutions can deliver!
Built in Wifi/Internet Access, Bluetooth Connectivity, Integrated SD – DVD Player.
Preloaded Popular Apps (Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube, Pandora & More).
Rugged Vibration Resistant Chassis for Trouble-Free Mobile/Off Road Use.
High-Definition Screen Sizes from 22” to 40”. “Flex-Environment” Engineering – Temperature and Humidity Adaptable.

4

(as of Nov 29,2022 04:34:41 UTC – Details)

Our Customers asked and Free Signal TV has delivered! The next generation of mobile 12V DC powered high-definition televisions have arrived, featuring built-in Smart TV features that campers, boaters and tailgaters have been asking for! The Transit Platinum 12 Volt TV line offers 22”, 28”, 32” and 40” high- definition 1080p LED screen sizes with built in Wifi/Internet connectivity and other cutting-edge features like ultra-low power draw, integrated SD-DVD player, easy Bluetooth connectivity, popular apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube and many more. Engineered for long lasting mobile use with vibration resistant chassis and durable 1080p high resolution LED screen. Standard home use televisions don’t last in a mobile environment – and the Transit Platinum models feature unique “Flex-Environment” engineering which allows reliable operation across a wide range of temperatures and humidities for reliable use in demanding environments. Manufactured to Free Signal TV’s rigid quality control standards and backed by a one-year free replacement warranty – an industry first that debuted with the original Transit 12 DC powered TV line. Easy set up and operation, includes 110V optional powerbrick, 12V car charger outlet cord, multi-function “one-key command” remote, and detailed user manual. Supported by Free Signal TV’s top-rated domestic-based Customer Care and Tech Support Teams for assistance with questions and customized set-up applications. Experience the enjoyment, performance and peace of mind that only Free Signal TV’s unique Advanced Entertainment Solutions can deliver!
Built in Wifi/Internet Access, Bluetooth Connectivity, Integrated SD – DVD Player.
Preloaded Popular Apps (Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube, Pandora & More).
Rugged Vibration Resistant Chassis for Trouble-Free Mobile/Off Road Use.
